DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study use qualitative interview focus group aid u adapt face-to-face smoking cessation intervention delivery text messaging . After design complete , intervention pilot test sample young adult ( age 18-35 ) smoke . Final assessment conduct 7 week ( end treatment ) 3 6 month follow .
DOC.brief_title: Examining Text Message Intervention Smoking Cessation
DOC.criteria: Age 18 35 Current daily smoker Has cell phone text messaging capability Uses text message least monthly Interested quit smoke Willing set quit date within next 30 day Has access physician Does read speak English adequate comprehension Is currently participate smoke cessation program Concurrent drug/alcohol abuse Mental health issue would interfere study compliance
